Description:
Parkside charm and meticulous modern style
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY - Impeccably designed to seduce you with its intrinsic weatherboard charm, this character family home enjoys majestic gardens and delightful parkland proximity. Exuding personality and displaying a wide verandah, colourbond roof, and double hung windows; a prelude to the interior appeal. Boasting hardwood timber floors, picture rails, ornate cornices and archways that reflect the unique character of this meticulously updated home, catering for a modern lifestyle of comfort and convenience. A spacious front lounge is warmed by a federation style gas log fire and free flows into the grand open family, casual dining. Extending to a breathtaking french provincial style chef's kitchen, premium appliances. Quality stone benchtops and striking black subway tiles complement the broad feature cabinets creating the ideal space for crafting culinary delights. A delightful breakfast bar appreciates the north easterly green backdrop via bi-fold windows and gazes over the luxurious timber decked alfresco, presenting an ideal space for social gatherings. The master bedroom soothes with ambient light via double hung stain glass windows with a picturesque view to nature. A fully fitted WIR and elegant ensuite feature a sunken bath and glass brick wall. The intelligent design of the opulent family bathroom delivers impeccable privacy that services two further tranquil bedrooms with BIRs. Completing the appeal, the home is surrounded by the flat, low maintenance, private gardens inviting bountiful birdsong. Spoilt for choice with easy access to a range of schools inclusive of Ruskin Park and Croydon PS, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Tintern Grammar. Central to Croydon Main street and Mooroolbark shopping and easy access to Eastland Shopping Centre. Recreational facilities include Aquahub, Dorset golf course, Brentwood and Town Parks. Easy transit to trains, buses and freeway access. Extra features include a smart study accessible via the loft, multiple split systems, 2 substantial garden sheds and ample off-street parking.
